content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Emilia Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Hello Emilia, nice to meet you. Let's start with a high price to see how much you are willing to pay. The apartment is in the city center and has everything you need, so I think 1,500 euros per month would be a fair price.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: While this apartment is certainly in a convenient location, I believe there might be some room for negotiation given my circumstances as a student. Could we possibly consider a lower figure around 1350 Euros?
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: I understand your situation as a student, but the location of the apartment is highly desirable and it's newly built. I think 1,350 euros is too low for this apartment. Let's meet halfway. How about 1,425 euros?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you for considering my perspective and making an adjustment. However, even though I appreciate the updated offer, it's still slightly above my budget limits. Could we perhaps try one more compromise at around 1375 Euros per month?
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: I'm willing to make a final concession, but I can't go any lower than 1,400 euros. The apartment's location and quality make it a great investment for you. I hope you can consider this final offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: After considering all aspects, including the favorable location and quality of the apartment, I have to accept that 1400 Euros is closer to what the market value may be in this case. I agree to the price of 1400 Euros! TERMINATE
name: Emilia Müller from Germany
